article_title: CMS Lays out Detailed Coverage Criteria for BRCA Testing in Draft LCD
article_text: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals is to be the new sponsor of the prestigious high school Science Talent Search competition, according to the New York Times.

article_metadata.description: The agency has described detailed situations under which it will cover BRCA testing and multi-gene panels for assessing risk for hereditary cancer syndromes.

og.description: The agency has described detailed situations under which it will cover BRCA testing and multi-gene panels for assessing risk for hereditary cancer syndromes.
